tool_description: data.police.uk UK Police crime data access api
name: UK Police Open Data
title: UK Police Open Data

api_list.name: Locate neighbourhood
api_list.description: Identify neighbourhood code of a point

api_list.name: Neighbourhood Information
Stop and searches by location
api_list.description: Returns a json array of stop and searches performed at a point

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: The date you would like to query [YYYY-MM]

api_list.name: Availability
api_list.description: Return a list of available data sets
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ukpolicedata.p.rapidapi.com/crimes-street-dates"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ukpolicedata.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Neighbourhood team
Neighbourhood Priorities
api_list.description: List of priority issues raised with police

api_list.name: Neighbourhood Events
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of events happening in neighbourhood

api_list.name: List crime near point
api_list.description: Returns list of crimes in the area of the specified point

api_list.name: Neighbourhood List
api_list.description: Returns a list of Neighbourhood IDS and their names

api_list.name: Outcome of single crime
api_list.description: Returns data on the outcome of a crime from unique ID

api_list.name: Forces list
api_list.description: Returns list of all forces with id's and names
